website_summaries.verdict: An affordable Wii U controller that has a fun look while still having great functionality.
pros: Features fun blue lighting that can also be turned off
Has a classic controller layout and very accurate analog sticks
Very affordable, especially when compared to name brand options
cons: Uses regular batteries instead of being able to recharge

customer_reviews.title: Very good Wii U Pro Controller
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent joysticks and very good buttons Very sturdy feeling, seems like a good quality product, no cheap made at all. Very easy to synchronize with Wii U Cons No built in vibration (just a detail to me, no dealbreaker) ZL and ZR buttons are very rigid, very little depth when pressed (again no dealbreaker, just an small detail). No built in battery, another detail, everyone has rechargeable batteries at home. In general I'm very pleased with this controller, I never used an original Nintendo one to compare, but this one to me is a great alternative at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Raul David Orozco Solaque

customer_reviews.title: Only likes fresh batteries
customer_reviews.text: Controller works great, but only with fresh batteries. We used it for a few hours playing BotW and it was great. Next day, we played again (battery meter said it was full) but kept disconnecting. After the frequency of the disconnecting increased, we checked and the battery meter drop a notch or 2. We swapped out for more fresh batteries and it worked like it did day 1. Then started to disconnect as the batteries got used a bit, again. We did have the light off, cause who really needs that? We were using brand new rechargable batteries. It's just too much to swap batteries every time we want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Se7en

customer_reviews.title: Best looking Wii U controller on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great controller, my nine year old son loves it and it's his Wii U controller. I like the blue glow as well. We use rechargeable AA batteries and they seem to last for approx. 10-20 hours of game time between charges. Never had any issues with it with any of the games we play and owe.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good aftermarket controller
customer_reviews.text: Decent controller and better quality than expected for 20 bucks. I left off a star because for some strange reason, while it does NOT have rumble functionality (which is fine, it's cheap) you can clearly see the cutouts in the plastic for where rumble motors should be. Why bother? Can you conceivably add your own if you want? Very strange to me and without them the controller is incredibly light.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Blatz

customer_reviews.title: Third party controllers are all pretty bad, but this is the least "crappy" one!
customer_reviews.text: I got the newest revision, without the rechargeable battery and rumble, which I actually prefer. Replacing AA batteries is much easier than trying to find a matching lithium-ion battery pack to solder in 5 years from now. The LEDs can be shut off and stay off after every boot up when you hit the button in the back. The joysticks feel good and the plastic quality while not OEM quality, is pretty close. All in all, these are not as good as the OEM, but the are also half the price. With that consideration, these are as good as a third-party Wii U controller will get.
customer_reviews.author: Technocian

customer_reviews.title: Controllers work very well. Charging option sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The cost and quality of the controller is excellent. So much we purchased 2. So why 3 stars? The listing states they are comparable with the Energizer Xbox one controller charger. It is not. The lithium batteries fit and the covers fit but will not stay connected to the docking bay. Even after fighting to get it to stay only one controller can charge at a time. The slightest bump or move it will loose connection. If your buying this controller to use with a charging dock use something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought it to play Minecraft and it has worked great. I guess some of the Pro controllers are ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked well right out of the box. My son loves the lights. We bought it to play Minecraft and it has worked great. I guess some of the Pro controllers are rechargeable, this one is not. Which is not a problem for us, but bothered my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: MommaAmandaTop Contributor: Ukuleles

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase of the same control
customer_reviews.text: This Control is a good part of the game set, it responds well and fits the hands, an adult with sausage fingers my kids says. I play with my kid cause I learned it's a good thing to do, only not for hours on end. The quality is real good and the price is too. I just may buy another for when my granddaughter comes over to stay. Hey it's a family thing man.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Lazcano

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and works great from 16'
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly, sync'd in seconds, very responsive while playing Mario Kart 8, Blue led's can be turned off or on during play, and they work great with the Energizer Controller Charging Station for xBox One.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Kalynuik

customer_reviews.title: Sucks the life out of batteries
customer_reviews.text: We have a regular Wii controller from the same company and never had issues so I felt confident purchasing this controller from them. Unfortunately, the batteries die super fast in this one. When the juice gets lower the controls won't respond well and sometimes while playing Minecraft the player won't be able to turn or will be stuck staring up at the sky :/ We are constantly charging batteries and replacing them. We also experienced this issue with brand new batteries. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: So PRETTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CONTROLLER! Great price, pretty lights, very responsive, and I swear it makes me play better... Lol... Ok. Maybe not that last one. But it is really nice NOT to pay the $70 at GameStop. And it's wireless;) LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Notjustasparrow

customer_reviews.title: It’s great except...It takes batteries
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great and plays well. The 3 ⭐️ ‘s is because it takes batteries and is not rechargeable. If I could plug it in to recharge it it would be 5 🌟 all the way!!! But if you don’t mind using batteries, I highly recommend this controller!!
customer_reviews.author: jesique

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The range isn't great, but it's acceptable. But this controller feels and looks great and functions just as well. Happy I didn't buy the stupidly expensive Nintendo brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Young

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: I'm not kidding. We had a Japanese Wii U Pro Controller imported at one point, several 3rd party controllers of the same variety, but this one is the best. The analog sticks are very accurate, so maybe not ruin them by playing SSB4 with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: This controller is excellent. The thumb sticks are accurate
customer_reviews.text: This controller is excellent. The thumb sticks are accurate. Works great on call of duty. The energizer recharge kit for Xboxone works great with it. BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: peace22

customer_reviews.title: Afterglow Pro Controller for Wii U
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work. I was not happy. I can't return because my husband thought he could fix it. Just be aware that it didn't work know matter what we did. thank you, JoyH.
customer_reviews.author: JoyH

customer_reviews.title: No rumble...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller over others because a. It looks cool gaming at night, and b. because I hoped spending a couple extra dollars would give me a littler higher quality. Evidently not. The controller itself is nice, runs with two AA batteries, has the afterglow as advertised...but no rumble. Yeeaah, not choosing this next time
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's a quality 3rd party controller for a great price
customer_reviews.text: For a third party controller that's only $15, the build quality is beyond what I would have expected. In fact, it really feels like it could have been a first party controller, but I digress. My only complaint is that it doesn't have a USB port which makes connecting this to any other device highly unlikely. Even so, I still appreciate the effort that went into making this and since I can't rate it 4 and 1/2 stars, I'm gonna go with 5.
customer_reviews.author: Micah H.

customer_reviews.title: Good if works.
customer_reviews.text: Feels decent quality and triggers are a major upgrade over stock Wii U controller imo, but mine came out of box with a faulty left analog stick. Probably questionable QA.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid controller!
customer_reviews.text: Afterglow makes good, solid controllers! I've hve several and like them all. WiiU pro model is very similar to an Xbox 360 controller in shape/size. I could do without the LED lights but not an issue, highly recommend over the hordes of cheap Chinese knockoff controllers on Amazon. I'm sure these are made in China too, but for a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great controllers, synced flawlessly. Only complaint would be back covers break off easily and won’t reattatch. Makes batteries fall out even when gently setting down remote.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aguglia

customer_reviews.title: Great controller quality, buttons and analog work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: The controller is well made and works great! I have some rechargeable batteries and the controller seems to have a great energy saving feature. The controller works flawlessly and all the button presses and analog inputs have no lag to them. The layout is difficult to get used to if you play xbox or playstation, but the controller itself is solid.
customer_reviews.author: chad cunningham

customer_reviews.title: not at all what I was thinking
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I thought this was NOT battery powered and something totally different. My mistake. Thanks to the seller for the refund!
customer_reviews.author: thejoysofraisingboys

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for Christmas. He loves it. Paired easily to the WIIU and works perfectly. My son is only 6 and wanted this for the glowing aspect but it is also comfortable to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spotty connection, but worked most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Controller worked great on the WII/U at our house, but did not work at friends house or lagged. Good tactical feedback and buttons.
customer_reviews.author: George Hsing

customer_reviews.title: Easy pair to wii u
customer_reviews.text: Paired easy. Works well so that my kids can all play together. I did invest in rechargeable batteries. The back of the battery pack is generically made and one(I bought 2) of the backs busted.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Style over substance
customer_reviews.text: Good controller. Burns through batteries too quickly. I would recommend that you purchase one of the controllers that has a rechargeable battery. Very cool controller, but not as fiscally responsible as many other controllers because of the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: The LR buttons are not good. This remote also just takes batteries instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. The LR buttons are not good. This remote also just takes batteries instead of charging. Perhaps I didn't thoroughly read the product specs but we have one from the same company that is far better and thought we were ordering the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lebro

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Used couple times and has a mind of its own. Contacted seller for replacement and will not replace. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Aslan

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable controller
customer_reviews.text: Not a reliable controller. It will randomly turn off and I have to take the batteries out and put them back in to make it function again. Also has a very weak signal doesn't work well at 10 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not rechargeable as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This controller only uses AA batteries Can not be rechargeable as advertised. No mini charger cords are even included. Misleading and not worth money in batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Putnam

customer_reviews.title: They Looked Cool and Worked Okay at First, But Not for Long
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product and when we first started using them they seemed great and worth the money. We noticed a slight lag, but not enough to be a concern and okay given the super low price. However, performance steadily declined over time to the point they've become completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Learned

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has been great!!! No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Reader Kids

customer_reviews.title: Too Many Connection Issues Too Often
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad little game pad but it loses connection with my Wii U far too often. FYI I made the mistake of thinking this was rechargeable but it's not. Batteries only.
customer_reviews.author: glen pappas

customer_reviews.title: Controls slowly deteriorate
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this controller. It doesn’t last and by the time it starts breaking, you can’t return it. Started having problems with the B button after 2 months and 3 months later the right analog stick is failing too. I’d give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: SakuraPetals

customer_reviews.title: Best if you don't care for rumble.
customer_reviews.text: Works. Battery lasts weeks and weeks if the lights stay off. Way more accurate than the fake Wii Upro controllers that i also bought, because these sticks have gradual control of your character or car etc.. vs the fake wiiu pro's are either %0 movement or %100 movement.
customer_reviews.author: JasonW

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the left thumbstick broke after maybe three weeks of playing for a few hours twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Lag time on walking and running
customer_reviews.text: It would have been great but it has a lag time when you use the left joystick that makes you have to move sllllooooowlllyyy or you will walk off the edge of things, into enemies, etc... depending on the game you are playing. Super frustruating. I'd move along to a different control if I was you. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Wood

customer_reviews.title: Disconnect sometimes
customer_reviews.text: It's good when works, but disconnect from time to time
customer_reviews.author: WWC

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects
customer_reviews.text: Used Fresh Batteries and randomly disconnects and is an entirely frustrating process. Tried on 2 controllers and was equally bad performance. It is unfortunate because the controllers look and feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this controller. Works well and looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Already Broken
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if we got a bad controller or what, but two days in and it’s no longer working. My daughter is so bummed. She thought it looked so cool and really wanted it as part of her birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not as described , it says wireless but does not say that is battery operated
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Solano

customer_reviews.title: Great controller
customer_reviews.text: This thing is as good as anything else, smooth, no problems, doesn't have motion sensor but I don't miss/need it. Really cool, add more LED colors! : )
customer_reviews.author: C Anders

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a back up controller
customer_reviews.text: The controller is okay but in certain games it disconnects from the unit. Repairing helps, but I have to do it often.
customer_reviews.author: SnowAeris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice controller
customer_reviews.text: Kid tested and approved! Works great LEDs are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: cebeze

customer_reviews.title: Stops working frequently.
customer_reviews.text: This controller is hit or miss if it works. It’s been frustrating to be playing and suddenly have it stop working.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: All show and no go buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: These controllers are total junk both sticks only go right. Very loose feeling tons of lag.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalCrown78

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller and that it wasnt as expensive as others. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These seem to have trouble pairing with our Wii U and lose connection.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for Minecraft for WiiU. Didn’t work with Zelda
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Good controller
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased was defected but I called and they sent me another one right away and it works really good
customer_reviews.author: roxana

customer_reviews.title: Not all that great
customer_reviews.text: Works good when it works, straight outta the box it had study issues but it's weird if you power off the controller most times that fixed the drift issue and the buttons aren't all that responsive either
customer_reviews.author: Chris Middleton

customer_reviews.title: so good! just one tip
customer_reviews.text: so far, so good! just one tip, when you power on the controller (pushing any button) don't touch the sticks or the cursor will be freeze on that direction.
customer_reviews.author: Reivyn Jose Calix Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Pros: feels great Cons: drops offline and consumes battereis
customer_reviews.text: It feels great to hold and responds great however it does drop offline randomly and the batteries are used up within a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: SalmonFace

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old. They love it. I've used it too and it works great. It was used but you wouldn't know it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Nephews, real experts love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephews who are the REAL gaming "experts." Mom has trouble keeping them on task and they complained that Dad played too long when he went up against one of them. SOOOOOOOO, he's getting his own for his birthday next week!
customer_reviews.author: LRACAC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy set up and my son loves playing all his Wii U games with this remote controller.
customer_reviews.author: Laura m.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite controller for the wii u. Its much better than the wii controllers.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Naudus

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It would not maintain a connection with the console. It also didn't come with a piece to cover the batteries. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: MLus

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: The controller itself works great, no input delay and the light is nice a bright. Feels a bit cheap, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sander

customer_reviews.title: Great controller, with style
customer_reviews.text: Great controller, with style! Blue lights are cool. Downside is that you have to change out batteries every now and then - wish it had builtin rechargable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Chad F.

customer_reviews.title: Tough and built well. Works great for my WII U
customer_reviews.text: Built really well for the price. So far has survived the rigorous torture only younger brothers can provide.
customer_reviews.author: THORNEDWAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This controller stopped working two months after we bought it! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sana Syed

customer_reviews.title: A good substitute.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good substitute for the WiiU pro controller. It feels the same and the buttons work with no lag. If you can't buy the pro controller on Amazon then these are a good substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool that the controller is clear you can see it light up when you play. Entertains the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Total crap but nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it is not responsive. I bought it early for a gift. I am very dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bapster

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month
customer_reviews.text: After just one month, it will not stay on, even with new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I only used it for a few times and it broke. Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: joh

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described and looks better in person than pictures 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Duul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo saved up his allowance money and bought this. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Cool Controllers
customer_reviews.text: No problems with these cool controllers yet. Just purchased them for Christmas 2017. Plays and handles well. Love how they glow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item !
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended Very cool looking Kids love it Get it before the price goes up !
customer_reviews.author: Ruth V.

customer_reviews.title: Requires batteries and works best with the lights on
customer_reviews.text: Works great most of the time. Sometimes the connection gets interrupted but only for a moment at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good controller so far I haven't had any issues. Son very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problems and good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought two so far and both are still working great 👍
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Stick drift
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a month and now the left stick drifts....
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this controller like crazy. Definently recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Jeeves

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't like having to load in double A batteries, but it plays fine
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sands

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and one of them is not work at all. No power. I would not recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ammanuel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and it works ver very well, very good product!
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Works just long enough that you can't return it
customer_reviews.text: The B button now triggers when the A button is pressed. This happened after a little over a month of moderate use. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Huge delay Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible remote for the Wii U it has about a half second delay and i even tried reconnecting it and standing very close to the wii u and the delay is still happening. I think i got a faulty controller.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: How it glows is really cool, but I don't like that it needs batteries, and there is no plug.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was rechargeable but it's a good control other than that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Controller broken and can't return b/c out of window. 0 stars for this one, what a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Steigerwald

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller. Came quickly and functions great. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Afterglow Pro Controller for Wii U
product_meta.description: Enhance your gaming experience with the Afterglow Pro Controller designed for the Wii U console. Featuring clear polycarbonate housing that reveals the controller's inner circuitry and signature Afterglow blue lighting; this controller is the perfect blend of performance and value. Enjoy 2 lighting modes: ON, and OFF, along with custom engineered SmartTrack technology for superior analog stick accuracy. The hassle free wireless connection, enhanced L/R and ZL/ZR buttons, and compatibility with Energizer Xbox One Chargers makes it the perfect pro controller for Wii U gamers.
feature_bullets: SmartTrack provides superior analog stick technology
Compatible with Energizer Xbox One Chargers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars498 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
